Text: *gasp*
Claire wakes up and finds herself lying in bed.
(What...happened to me...?)
Are you awake?
*gasp*

When she looks in the voice's direction, she sees a
woman with long black hair.
Your possession.

He cured you long ago of the thing that has worried
you so. He knows everything, after all.

Wait... My possession? It's healed? And who is
"he"...?
I believe you know him quite well.
No, I don't. What are you talking about?

How to put this simply...? Unfortunately, you're
adapting, and losing control in the process.
Soon, the corruption will overtake you.
What...?!
That's why I've come to lend you a bit of my power.

Quit messing around! I still don't have a clue what's
going on here!

Where am I? Who are you? And who is this "he" you
keep talking about?!

You sure ask a lot of questions... Maybe that's what
comes from having such a lax education...
The full explanation would take too long.
Please tell me.
Are you familiar with "evolution"?

According to a certain researcher's hypothesis,
humans originally came from apes. Apes spent
countless years adapting to their environments,
and that's how humans came to be...

What're you talking about? What does that have to do
with any of this?

See, the thing is, one of the other researchers
asserted that living creatures don't adapt to
their environments.

Due to the harsh natural environment, more of the
smarter apes survived and went on to become humans...
Seriously, what're you even talking about?
In other words...

The apes didn't adapt by choice. Only the ones who
happened to be suited to their environments survived
and evolved.
See, the thing is...
Forgive me, what were we talking about again?
No idea.
Oh, right, right, I was talking about adaptation.

The point of the matter is that the blood's nature
being divided in two is the product of adaptation
as well.
...Huh?

The possessed and the Progenitor Vampire—the
properties of the two split blood types were also
divided.

And now the two blood types are trying to adapt
inside of you.

Unfortunately, you fulfill the conditions, and even
worse, you have no means by which to control them.

That's why your blood is running wild and destroying
your bod—
Ah, we're out of time.

H-Hey, hold up, the part you just got to sounded
really important!
Wait, ow?!

A sharp pain suddenly shoots across Claire's hand.
Looking down, she finds an intricate magic circle
drawn on the back of it.
What the...?
The seal will teach you how to control your power.
Can you explain it a bit more—
Our time is up, and things are looking bad out there.
Wait! Who are you anyway?!
Why did you...why are you helping me?
I'm Aurora. I helped you because you're his...
Who is "he"?!
Shadow...
Shadow...?
And then the world shatters.
